name: HysterectomyWithOrWithoutCervix
title: Hysterectomy (with or without cervix)
description: This value set has been tested at one clinical pilot environment. Use with caution. (Reviewed for code updates 4/2022)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Absence of uterus indicating inability to become pregnant),(Data Element Scope: Any ICD 10 code indicating absence of the uterus),(Inclusion Criteria: Absence of uterus),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

Acquired absence of uterus with remaining cervical stump
